dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3461076V] Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, March 12, 2007 11:16 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3461076V] Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse Added by system at Monday, Mar 12 2007 03:45 pm X-MailFrom: Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Mar 12 15:45:02 2007 Received: (qmail 14133 invoked by alias); 12 Mar 2007 20:45:02 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 14128 invoked from network); 12 Mar 2007 20:45:01 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 12 Mar 2007 20:45:01 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 12 Mar 2007 15:45:01 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 12 Mar 2007 15:45:01 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HQrO9-00033M-Co for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 15:45:01 -0500 Received: from mail3.imaphost.com ([38.100.41.83] helo=cyveillance.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HQrO4-0008TF-Ol for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 15:44:56 -0500 Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com [10.20.1.21]) by plmail3.prod.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 7AFF9B7696; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 16:40:02 -0400 (EDT) Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]) by plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (8.12.11/8.12.11) with ESMTP id l2CKiqRs019069; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 15:44:53 -0500 Date: Mon, 12 Mar 2007 16:44:52 -0400 (EDT) From: Chicago.Trademarks@corphq.hyatt.com To: asd888asj8bhbhyasd676787asbdhbahsbdht767676asdbhbhasd@startseek.com Cc: abuse@theplanet.com Message-ID: <1801071.571173732292927.JavaMail.cicusr@plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com> Subject: Cease and Desist - Hyatt Domain Abuse MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_Part_57_4302469.1173732292925" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Mar 2007 20:45:01.0715 (UTC) FILETIME=[4E4B9E30:01C764E7] (multipart/mixed) MIME element (text/html)

3/12/2007

Dear WhoisGuard Protected ,

This is a follow up to our cease and desist letter issued to you on February 26, 2007; the Hyatt Corporation has not received a response from you.  This letter is to notify you that your unauthorized registration and use of the domain name, http://www.hyattsainteclaire.com/, dilute and infringe the "Hyatt" mark and are in violation of trademark law.

The Hyatt Corporation reiterates its demands that you immediately cease and desist from all infringing uses of the "Hyatt" mark and reply to this email with confrimation that you will make no such use of the "Hyatt" mark in the future.  The Hyatt Corporation considers this infringement to be very serious.  If email confirmation is not received within five (5) days from the date of this letter regarding the foregoing demands, the Hyatt Corporation will be forced to consider its legal options to enforce its rights to the fullest extent permitted under federal and state laws.

Nothing in this letter shall be deemed a waiver of any rights or remedies of the Hyatt Corporation, all of which are expressly reserved.

Sincerely,

The Hyatt Corporation

Ref: 1.5.33  http://www.hyattsainteclaire.com/

MIME element (text/plain)
